description: This file defines a 'NoteEditor' component using the LightningJS framework, providing a user interface for editing and saving notes with a title and content.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component that provides a note editing interface with title and content, including save functionality.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Emit a save event with the current title and content.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Private wrapper to trigger save when the save button is pressed.
